00104 template<typename T>
00105 bool ScalarIter_Base<T>::dataIsSequential( Idx<T>& idx ){
00106         if( !idx.spec.contiguousp() ){
00107                 return false;
00108         }
00109         
00110         for( int dd = 0; dd < idx.spec.ndim-1; ++dd ){
00111                 if( idx.spec.mod[dd] < idx.spec.mod[dd+1] ){
00112                         return false;
00113                 }
00114         }
00115         
00116         return true;
00117 }
00118 
00119 template<typename T>
00120 bool ScalarIter_Base<T>::operator==( const ScalarIter_Base<T>& other ) const{
00121         return this->data == other.data;
00122 }

00126         return *data;

00130 T* ScalarIter_Base<T>::operator->(){
00131         return data;
00132 }

00134 template<typename T>
00135 bool ScalarIter_Base<T>::notdone(){
00136         return data != dataEnd;
00137 }
00138 
00139 template<typename T>
00140 void ScalarIter_Base<T>::incr_contiguous(){
00141         ++data;
00142 }
00143 
00144 template<typename T>
00145 void ScalarIter_Base<T>::decr_contiguous(){
00146         --data;
00147 }
00148 
00150 template<typename T>
00151 void ScalarIter_Base<T>::incr_noncontiguous(){
00152         assert( spec.ndim > 0 );
00153         
00154         int dd = spec.ndim-1;
00155         ++inds[dd];
00156         data += spec.mod[dd];
00157         
00158         while( dd > 0 && (inds[dd] == spec.dim[dd]) ){
00159                 data += (spec.mod[dd-1] - spec.dim[dd]*spec.mod[dd]);
00160                 inds[dd] = 0;
00161                 --dd;
00162                 ++inds[dd];
00163         }
00164         
00165         // check for terminal condition
00166         if( inds[0] == spec.dim[0] ){
00167                 data = dataEnd;
00168         }
00169 }
00170 
00172 template<typename T>
00173 void ScalarIter_Base<T>::decr_noncontiguous(){
00174         assert( spec.ndim > 0 );
00175 
00176         int dd = spec.ndim-1;
00177         --inds[dd];
00178         data -= spec.mod[dd];
00179         
00180         while( dd > 0 && inds[dd] == -1 ){
00181                 inds[dd] = spec.dim[dd]-1;
00182                 data -= (spec.mod[dd-1] - spec.dim[dd]*spec.mod[dd]);
00183                 --dd;
00184                 --inds[dd];
00185         }
00186         
00187         // Check for terminal condition. 
00188         /* Note that this doesn't prevent us from calculating dist,
00189          * since this func is only called for non-contiguous iterators,
00190          * where we can calculate dist using inds and spec.dim.
00191          */
00192         if( inds[0] == -1 ){
00193                 data = dataEnd;
00194         }
00195         
00196 }

00269 
00270 template<typename T>
00271 ScalarIter_Base<T>::ScalarIter_Base(Idx<T>& idx)
00272         :spec(idx.spec), 
00273          data(idx.getstorage()->data + idx.spec.offset),
00274          dataEnd(NULL)
00275          //incrPolicy(spec.ndim == 0 ? CONTIGUOUS : spec.contiguousp() ? CONTIGUOUS : NONCONTIGUOUS)
00276 {
00277         // initialize inds to visibly bogus value
00278         inds[0] = std::numeric_limits<int>::max();
00279         
00280         // initialize isSimpleIteration
00281         isSimpleIteration = true;
00282         if( !idx.spec.contiguousp() ){
00283                 isSimpleIteration = false;
00284         }
00285         else{
00286                 for( int dd = 0; dd < idx.spec.ndim-1; ++dd ){
00287                         if( idx.spec.mod[dd] < idx.spec.mod[dd+1] ){
00288                                 isSimpleIteration = false;
00289                         }
00290                 }
00291         }
00292         
00293         // inds, data, dataEnd are initialized in subclass constructors.
00294 }
00295         
00296 
00297 template<typename T>
00298 ScalarIter_Base<T>::ScalarIter_Base( const ScalarIter_Base<T>& other)
00299         :spec(other.spec),
00300          data(other.data),
00301          dataEnd(other.dataEnd),
00302          isSimpleIteration(other.isSimpleIteration)
00303          //incrPolicy(other.incrPolicy)
00304 {
00305         std::copy(other.inds, other.inds+MAXDIMS, this->inds);
00306 }
00307 
00308 template<typename T>
00309 const ScalarIter_Base<T>&
00310 ScalarIter_Base<T>::operator=( const ScalarIter_Base<T>& other ){
00311         this->spec = other.spec;
00312         std::copy( other.inds, other.inds + MAXDIMS, this->inds );
00313         this->data = other.data;
00314         this->dataEnd = other.dataEnd;
00315         this->isSimpleIteration = other.isSimpleIteration;
00316         //this->incrPolicy = other.incrPolicy;
00317         return *this;
00318 }
00319 
00320 template<typename T>
00321 ScalarIter<T>::ScalarIter( Idx<T>& idx, bool isBeginning )
00322         :ScalarIter_Base<T>(idx)
00323 {
00324         
00325         // set dataEnd
00326         if( this->spec.ndim == 0 ){
00327                 this->dataEnd = this->data + 1;
00328         }
00329         else if( this->isSimpleIteration ){
00330                 this->dataEnd = this->data + idx.spec.mod[0] * idx.spec.dim[0];
00331         }
00332         else{
00333                 // find maximum mod to find end of data.
00334                 int maxmod = 0, maxmoddim = 0;
00335                 for (int i = 0; i < idx.spec.ndim; ++i) {
00336                         if (idx.spec.mod[i] > maxmod) {
00337                                 maxmod = idx.spec.mod[i];
00338                                 maxmoddim = idx.spec.dim[i];
00339                         }
00340                 }
00341                 this->dataEnd = this->data + maxmoddim * maxmod;
00342         }
00343         
00344         // set inds
00345         if( this->isSimpleIteration ){
00346                 // set unused inds array to something deliberately and flagrantly bogus
00347                 this->inds[0] = std::numeric_limits<int>::max(); 
00348         }
00349         else{
00350                 
00351                 if(isBeginning){
00352                         std::fill( this->inds, this->inds + this->spec.ndim, 0);
00353                 }
00354                 else{
00355                         this->inds[0] = this->spec.dim[0];
00356                         std::fill( this->inds+1, this->inds+ this->spec.ndim, 0);
00357                 }
00358         }
00359         
00360         // move data pointer to end if called for.
00361         if( !isBeginning ){
00362                 this->data = this->dataEnd;
00363         }       
00364 }
00365

00368 ScalarIter<T>::ScalarIter( const ScalarIter<T>& other )
00369         :ScalarIter_Base<T>(other)
00370 {}

00373 template<typename T>
00374 ScalarIter<T>& 
00375 ScalarIter<T>::operator++(){
00376         if( this->isSimpleIteration ){
00377                 this->incr_contiguous();
00378         }
00379         else{
00380                 this->incr_noncontiguous();
00381         }
00382         return *this;
00383 }

00390         ++this;
00391         return result;
00392 }

00395 template<typename T>
00396 ScalarIter<T>& 
00397 ScalarIter<T>::operator--(){
00398         if( this->isSimpleIteration ){
00399                 this->decr_contiguous();
00400         }
00401         else{
00402                 this->decr_noncontiguous();
00403         }
00404         return *this;
00405 }

00431 template<typename T>
00432 std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream& out, ScalarIter_Base<T>& si ){
00433         out<<"<ScalarIterator_Base  inds: ";
00434         for( int dd = 0; dd < si.spec.getndim(); ++dd ){
00435                 out<<si.inds[dd]<<" ";
00436         }
00437         out<<" value = "<<*si<<">";
00438         return out;
00439 }

00442 
00443 template<typename T>
00444 ReverseScalarIter<T>::ReverseScalarIter( Idx<T>& idx, bool isBeginning )
00445         :ScalarIter_Base<T>(idx)
00446 {
00447 
00448         // set dataEnd
00449         if( this->isSimpleIteration ){ // includes the case of ndim == 0
00450                 this->dataEnd = this->data - 1;
00451         }
00452         else{
00453                 this->dataEnd = NULL;
00454         }
00455                 
00456         // set inds
00457         if( this->isSimpleIteration ){
00458                 // set unused inds array to something deliberately and flagrantly bogus
00459                 this->inds[0] = std::numeric_limits<int>::max(); 
00460         }
00461         else{
00462                 
00463                 if(isBeginning){
00464                         this->inds[0] = this->spec.dim[0]-1;
00465                 }
00466                 else{
00467                         this->inds[0] = -1;
00468                 }
00469 
00470                 for( int dd = 1; dd < this->spec.ndim; ++dd ){
00471                         this->inds[dd] = this->spec.dim[dd]-1;
00472                 }
00473         }
00474         
00475         // set data pointer
00476         if( isBeginning ){
00477                 if( this->isSimpleIteration ){
00478                         this->data += this->spec.mod[0]*this->spec.dim[0] - 1;
00479                 }
00480                 else{
00481                         for( int dd = 0; dd < this->spec.ndim; ++dd ){
00482                                 this->data += this->spec.mod[dd] * (this->spec.dim[dd] - 1);
00483                         }
00484                 }
00485         }
00486         else{
00487                 this->data = this->dataEnd;
00488         }       
00489         
00490 }
00491

00493 template<typename T>
00494 ReverseScalarIter<T>& ReverseScalarIter<T>::operator++(){
00495         if( this->isSimpleIteration ){
00496                 this->decr_contiguous();
00497         }
00498         else{
00499                 this->decr_noncontiguous();
00500         }
00501 
00502         return *this;
00503 }

00535 template<typename T>
00536 DimIter_Base<T>::DimIter_Base(Idx<T>& idx, int dimInd)
00537         : Idx<T>(idx.select((dimInd >= 0 ? dimInd : dimInd + idx.order()), 0))
00538 //       dimInd(dimInd),
00539 //       dimMod(idx.spec.mod[dimInd]),
00540 //       dataEnd(idx.getstorage()->data + ( idx.spec.offset + 
00541 //                               idx.spec.mod[dimInd] * idx.spec.dim[dimInd] ))
00542          //subtensor(idx.select(dimInd, 0)),
00543 //       dataEnd(this->subtensor.getstorage()->data + 
00544 //                       (this->subtensor.spec.offset + this->dimMod * idx.spec.dim[dimInd]))
00545 {
00546         if( dimInd < 0 ){
00547                 ylerror("DimIter_Base: negative looping dimension");
00548                 dimInd += idx.order();
00549         }
00550         //this->subtensor = idx.select(dimInd,0);
00551         this->dimInd = dimInd;
00552         this->dimMod = idx.spec.mod[dimInd];
00553         this->dataEnd = idx.getstorage()->data + 
00554                                         ( idx.spec.offset + idx.spec.mod[dimInd] * idx.spec.dim[dimInd] );
00555 }

00570         dimInd = other.dimInd;
00571         dimMod = other.dimMod;
00572         //subtensor = other.subtensor;
00573         dataEnd = other.dataEnd;
00574         return *this;
00575 }
00576 
00577 template<typename T>
00578 bool DimIter_Base<T>::operator==( const DimIter_Base& other ){
00579         // like operator== in ScalarIter, this is lean and mean; no checks.
00580         return this->getstorage()->data + this->spec.offset == other.storage->data + other.spec.offset;
00581 //      return subtensor.storage->data + subtensor.spec.offset == 
00582 //                 other.storage->data + other.spec.offset;
00583 }

00594         //return subtensor;

00596 
00597 template<typename T>
00598 void DimIter_Base<T>::incr(){
00599         this->spec.offset += this->dimMod;
00600 }
00601 
00602 template<typename T>
00603 void DimIter_Base<T>::decr(){
00604         this->spec.offset -= this->dimMod; 
00605 }
00606 
00607 template<typename T>
00608 bool DimIter_Base<T>::notdone(){
00609         //return ind == dimSize;
00610         //dataInd == dimSize
00611         return (this->getstorage()->data + this->spec.offset) != this->dataEnd;
00612 }
00613 
00614 template<typename T>
00615 DimIter<T>::DimIter( Idx<T>& idx, int dimInd, bool isBeginning )
00616         : DimIter_Base<T>(idx, dimInd)
00617 {
00618         if(!isBeginning){
00619                 // increment spec.offset so that the first Idx elemetn points to dataEnd
00620                 T* dataBegin = this->getstorage()->data + this->spec.offset;
00621                 this->spec.offset += std::distance( dataBegin, this->dataEnd );
00622                 assert(this->getstorage()->data + this->spec.offset == this->dataEnd);
00623         }
00624 }
00625

00627 DimIter<T>::DimIter(const DimIter<T>& other)
00628         :DimIter_Base<T>(other)
00629 {}

00676 template<typename T>
00677 ReverseDimIter<T>::ReverseDimIter( Idx<T>& idx, int dimInd, bool isBeginning )
00678         :DimIter_Base<T>(idx, dimInd, isBeginning)
00679 {
00680         T* data = this->subtensor.storage()->data;
00681         this->dataEnd = data - this->dimMod; 
00682 
00683         if( !isBeginning ){
00684                 this->subtensor.storage()->data = this->dataEnd;
00685         }
00686 }

00699 
00700 template<typename T>
00701 bool ReverseDimIter<T>::operator()(){
00702         //return ind == dimSize;
00703         //dataInd == dimSize
00704         return this->subtensor.getstorage()->data + this->subtensor.spec.offset != this->dataEnd;
00705 }
00706 
00707 template<typename T>
00708 ReverseDimIter<T>&
00709 ReverseDimIter<T>::operator++(){
00710         this->incr();
00711         return *this;
00712 }
00713 
00714 template<typename T>
00715 ReverseDimIter<T>
00716 ReverseDimIter<T>::operator++(int){
00717         ReverseDimIter<T> returnVal(*this);
00718         this->incr();
00719         return returnVal;
00720 }
00721 
00722 template<typename T>
00723 ReverseDimIter<T>&
00724 ReverseDimIter<T>::operator--(){
00725         this->decr();
00726         return *this;
00727 }
00728 
00729 template<typename T>
00730 ReverseDimIter<T>
00731 ReverseDimIter<T>::operator--(int){
00732         ReverseDimIter<T> returnVal(*this);
00733         this->decr();
00734         return returnVal;
00735 }

00737 template<typename T>
00738 bool
00739 ReverseDimIter<T>::operator==( const ReverseDimIter<T>& other ){
00740         return DimIter_Base<T>::operator==(other);
00741 }
